comment: A really strong, hard to produce, discontinued offering. Absolutely suits the 7S stable, but like Czar’s more friendly cousin. Chocolate, and coffee and then hops show up and start smashing up the place.
Good nose. It is very coffee forward with a good burn.  Decent but would not buy again.
Coffee and sweetness on the nose. Big and sweet taste and finishes with quite a bite.
Interesting. As a distilled coffee liquor, it’s nice. As a higher end bourbon, it’s... weird. Porter-infused bourbon fades to highly alcoholic coffee on the end. Very interesting.
